law.catch_line: Height and weight requirements for baskets of tobacco.
law.text: The Commissioner shall promulgate administrative regulations establishing the height and weight requirements of a basket of tobacco when placed on a warehouse floor for the purpose of sale. In establishing the requirements, the Commissioner shall consider traditional height and weight standards for baskets of tobacco, and shall consider experimental marketing standards that may be applied from time to time.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.
